content: chain 1 rsc across finish off with long tail for sewing weave in short tail finishing round 1 with wrong sides together the back will be slightly smaller than the front but the stitch count should be the same working through both pieces using the standard crochet hook with the back facing join yarn in any corner chain 1 single_crochet in same st as joining single_crochet evenly around doing 3 single_crochet in each corner to the 1st single_crochet 2 single_crochet in same st join to 1st single_crochet note when about half way done on the 4th side stuff pillow with fiberfill round 2 chain 1 turn rsc in each single_crochet around join to 1st rsc finish off weave in ends embroider flower onto pocket if desired sew pocket onto the middle of the front of the pillow midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2008-2014 4
